item.title: More Info added
item.description: I updated the about me and added a small showcase with information about what I did.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I’m Ekki! I like to make and play games, build software and follow various other interests. You can find more info on what I did professionally in the Showcase. For CV info please refer to my LinkedIn-Profile. Varrious other interests? I enjoy anything horror-themed, whatever the medium. I also like watching american football and discussing infrastructure politics.

item.title: Hello Visitor
item.description: Hey, it’s a blog again. This is where it all starts.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Front-End Development I have worked as a front-end developer with Angular/Typescript for Web and also Nativescript for Mobile platforms for one year. Before that I did a couple of uni projects that included a focus on front-end development, mostly in Unity. Games The important ones can be found at mildlyentertaining.games. If you are looking for game design or development work for game projects contact me on social media or write an email to games@itsnothing.

item.title: Impressum
